question:
Which among the following countries is/are the leading importers and exporters of all category of textiles?
  1. US
  2. Germany
  3. UK
  4. France
Select the correct code from the options given below:
explanation: Textiles have long been an important item of international trade. Trade in textiles amounts to 2.5 per cent in the total merchandise trade of the world and 3.4 per cent of the trade in manufactures. US, Germany, UK and France figure among leading importers and exporters of all categories of goods.
